          "parent_id": "99450b4c-f6d5-44fa-90ca-13a710395980",

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "Ruby Standard Library has a Singleton module which implements the Singleton pattern. The first step in creating a Singleton class is to require and include the "
              ],
              ["Singleton", [["b"], ["c"]]],
              [" module in a class:"]
            ]
          },
